amc_info.description: Quantum Mutual Fund started their mutual fund on 02/12/2005 and its managing total assets of â‚¹1,164 Cr. Its ranked at 32 as per total assets at end of 30th Sep 2016.
amc_info.more_description:
Quantum Mutual Fund was launched on 2nd December, 2015 and is sponsored by Quantum Advisors Private Ltd. The asset management company has one clear goal, which is to convert an investor's saving to wealth. They aspire to provide simple, yet effective products to investors, which impacts them positively in their financial journey.

They believe in providing risk-adjusted returns and aim at providing long-term benefits to investors, by following a systematic approach of investing.

Quantum Mutual Funds provide various schemes of mutual funds across different categories like equity, debt and hybrid and they also invest in various market capitalization. They believe in three corporate values, which are honesty, transparency and performance. Their vision is to become India's most respected mutual fund house by following their values and keeping their business policy simple and transparent.

category_info.category_helper_text: Invests in stocks as per Contrarian investment strategy
category_info.tax_impact: If you redeem within one year, returns are taxed at 20%. If you redeem after one year, returns exceeding Rs 1.25 lakh in a financial year are taxed at 12.5%.
category_info.description: Contra funds follow Contrarian strategy which means investing in stocks in contrast to the prevailing sentiment. Minimum investment in equity is 65%.
